outdated_firmware.title: Device firmware is outdated
outdated_firmware.description:
Your Vitrea device firmware version {current_version} is below the minimum required version {min_version}. To fix this issue:
1. Open the Vitrea mobile app.
1. Navigate to device settings.
1. Select 'Update Firmware'.
1. Wait for the update to complete.
1. Restart Home Assistant.
